tool_description: Automatically detects the primary language of input text to enable appropriate language-specific processing for text-to-speech synthesis.

input_text.description: Text to analyze for language detection

confidence_threshold.description: Minimum confidence level (0.5-1.0) for language detection

error_messages: Insufficient text: Provide at least 10 characters for reliable language detection.
Low confidence: Detection confidence below threshold, consider manual language specification.
Invalid confidence threshold: Value must be between 0.5 and 1.0.
usage: Provide input_text for analysis. Optionally set confidence_threshold to control detection sensitivity. Returns detected language with confidence score.

detected_language.description: ISO 639-1 language code of detected language

alternative_languages.description: Other possible languages with lower confidence
